name: claude-flow-multi-agent-system
description: Multi-agent orchestration system for data science workflows

scripts.swarm:data-analysis: node .claude/core/cli.js orchestrate 'PHMRC child data exploration' parallel high
scripts.swarm:ml-pipeline: node .claude/core/cli.js orchestrate 'Train InSilicoVA and TabICL models' adaptive high
scripts.swarm:research: node .claude/core/cli.js orchestrate 'Research VA methodologies' hierarchical normal

author: Claude Code Multi-Agent System
